meta.description: Traveling Salesman Problem with 5 cities and specific distance matrix.

sets.name: CITIES
sets.description: Set of cities including the starting city

vars.name: x
vars.description: Binary variable indicating if the path between city i and city j is taken

objective.name: min_total_distance
objective.expr: sum(distance[i][j] * x[i][j] for i in CITIES for j in CITIES)

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: visit_each_city_once_5
constraints.description: City 5 must be departed from exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_each_city_once_1
constraints.description: City 1 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_each_city_once_2
constraints.description: City 2 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_each_city_once_3
constraints.description: City 3 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_each_city_once_4
constraints.description: City 4 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: arrive_each_city_once_5
constraints.description: City 5 must be arrived at exactly once

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_3
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 3

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 4

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_2_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 2 and city 5

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_4
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 4

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_3_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 3 and city 5

constraints.name: subtour_elimination_4_5
constraints.description: Subtour elimination constraint between city 4 and city 5
